document.full_text: drawing the no. 9 post, kentucky derby winner animal kingdom has been made the 2-1 favorite in a field of 12 for the belmont stakes.
document.title: animal kingdom is 2-1 favorite for saturday's belmont
lines_and_colors: drawing the no. 9 post, kentucky derby winner animal kingdom has been made the 2-1 favorite in a field of 12 for the belmont stakes.
